translation.en: -[woman] Loyal readers, -[keys clacking] my favorite holiday is just around the corner.
translation.de: Liebe treue Leserschaft, mein Lieblingsfest steht bevor.

translation.en: Christmas means joy, excitement, family, love and lights.
translation.de: Weihnachten steht für Freude, Begeisterung, Familie, Liebe und Lichter.

translation.en: It also means my first year as Queen of Aldovia
translation.de: Und es heißt, mein erstes Jahr als Königin Aldoviens

translation.en: is nearly under my belt.
And just... [inhales] Wow!
What a year.
Royal life has a way of transforming everything.
As the year began, Richard and I enjoyed a magical honeymoon.
translation.de: Zu Jahresbeginn erlebten Richard und ich traumhafte Flitterwochen.

translation.en: Once home,
our revised new Aldovia initiative continued to grow.
translation.de: machte unsere Initiative für ein neues Aldovien Fortschritte.

translation.en: And that's how we'll fund the tech center. And the new hospital.
translation.de: -So finanzieren wir das Tech-Zentrum. -Und die Klinik.

translation.en: [Amber] And quickly began paying dividends.
translation.de: Schon bald zahlte es sich aus.

translation.en: As did my efforts to learn about Aldovia's history and families.
translation.de: Ebenso meine Mühen, Aldoviens Geschichte und Familien zu studieren.

translation.en: -That knowledge is very helpful -[indistinct chatter] at functions like Royal State dinners.
translation.de: Dieses Wissen ist sehr hilfreich bei Events wie den Royal State Dinners.

translation.en: And the people of Aldovia are fully embracing their Queen Amber of New York.
translation.de: Und die Bürger Aldoviens lieben ihre neue Königin Amber.

translation.en: -[keys clacking] -This year has been super busy,
but next year is gonna be...
even busier.
-[applause] -[man] Richard, this way!
[woman, yelling] Congratulations on the baby!
-[cameras shutter] -Over here!
[woman 2] Beautiful!
Have you chosen the baby's name?
[together] No.
-[laughter] -Are you expecting a boy or a girl?
translation.de: Wird es ein Junge oder Mädchen?

translation.en: -We haven't found out yet. -We're waiting to be surprised.
You've updated Aldovia's line of succession to include females.
translation.de: Sie weiteten Aldoviens Erbfolge auf Frauen aus.

translation.en: Does that mean it's a girl?
It means that we are hoping to bring Aldovia
translation.de: Wir hoffen lediglich, Aldovien kulturell ins 21. Jahrhundert zu befördern,

translation.en: into the 21st Century culturally, just as the new Aldovia initiative
translation.de: Wir hoffen lediglich, Aldovien kulturell ins 21. Jahrhundert zu befördern, wie die Initiative in Wirtschaftsbelangen.

translation.en: -has done economically. -[clamoring]
Will you at least tell us the baby's due date?
January the 11th.
Will you be taking time off?
-[Amber] Yes. -Starting in two days time,
following the centennial treaty signing with the Kingdom of Penglia.
translation.de: Nach Vertragsunterzeichnung mit dem Königreich Penglien.

translation.en: Our last official duty of the year.
Now are there any policy questions, economic queries, foreign affairs?
translation.de: Gibt es politische Fragen? Fragen zu Wirtschaft und Außenpolitik?

translation.en: About the baby. Do you have any names to share?
translation.de: -Nicht? -Noch mal zum Baby. Gibt es Namen?

translation.en: -[together] No. -[laughter]
Have you truly not chosen the name?
You won't give up, will you?
Well, I'd be delighted to finally know what names you're considering.
translation.de: Ich würde gern wissen, welche Namen ihr erwägt.

translation.en: We're not telling anyone, Mother.
We're all family here. What Richard said.
translation.de: -Wir sind eine Familie. -Ich schließ mich Richard an.

translation.en: -For a girl, I say Khaleesi. -Hermione is lovely as well.
translation.de: -Ein Mädchen soll Khaleesi heißen. -Hermine ist auch nett.

translation.en: Claudette is a family name I'm very fond of or Claude for a boy.
translation.de: Claudette ist ein Familienname, den ich mag, Claude für einen Jungen.

translation.en: Well, if it is a boy, I won't be offended if you decided to name him Simon,
translation.de: Wird's ein Junge, wäre es nett, wenn er Simon heißt.

translation.en: or Simone for a girl, obviously.
All lovely names, we will take them under advisement.
translation.de: Alles schöne Namen, wir werden sie in Betracht ziehen.

translation.en: Your Majesty, in a few weeks' time when the baby arrives,
translation.de: Eure Majestät, in ein paar Wochen, wenn das Baby kommt,

translation.en: the surprise will be all the sweeter.
You always put things in perspective.
translation.de: Sie rücken immer alles ins rechte Licht.

translation.en: I just hope I'm half as beautiful as Amber is when I become pregnant.
translation.de: In meiner Schwangerschaft will ich auch so toll aussehen.

translation.en: That's an unsettling thought to put into your mother's head.
translation.de: Ein beunruhigender Gedanke für eine Mutter.

translation.en: Not nearly as unsettling as your continued presence.
translation.de: Nicht so beunruhigend wie deine ständige Anwesenheit.

translation.en: Your Majesties,
you have a guest.
I wonder who on Earth that could be.
Surprise!
-Melissa! -[Melissa laughs]
-[Amber gasps] -[Melissa giggles]
Oh, you look fantastic!
-I feel like a watermelon. -[scoffs]
translation.de: Ich fühl mich wie eine Melone.

translation.en: But it's so great that you could surprise me early for the baby shower.
translation.de: Schön, dass du mich noch vor der Babyparty überraschst.

translation.en: I am early, but that's not actually the surprise.
translation.de: Ich bin früh dran, aber das ist nicht die Überraschung.

translation.en: Simon's invited me to stay through Christmas. [chuckles]
translation.de: Simon lud mich ein, über Weihnachten zu bleiben.

translation.en: A fabulous idea, if I may say so.
translation.de: Eine tolle Idee, wenn ich das sagen darf.

translation.en: Wow, great! [laughs]
It's so good to see you.
Yeah. [laughs] You too. So, are you daddy ready?
translation.de: Ja! Ebenso. Und? Bereit fürs Vatersein?

translation.en: -Getting there, [exhales] I think. -[Melissa giggles]
Staying with someone's family over Christmas is a big deal.
translation.de: Man lädt sich nicht über Weihnachten ein.

translation.en: -She should've told us. -She wanted to surprise you.
She knows how you feel about Simon.
translation.de: Sie weiß von dir und Simon.

translation.en: -[sighs] Well, I don't trust him. -No, neither do I. He has behaved all year.
translation.de: -Ich traue ihm nicht. -Ich auch nicht. Aber das Jahr lief gut.

translation.en: In the hope that we'll give him an official position. Which we haven't.
translation.de: -Weil er auf ein Amt hofft. -Was wir ihm nicht gaben.

translation.en: [stammers] I just don't want Melissa to get hurt.
Let them be.
We have more important issues to attend to.
Like my birth plan.
And the baby's musical enrichment.
translation.de: Und die musikalische Bildung des Babys.

translation.en: I'm pretty sure research debunked the myth that classical music makes your baby smarter.
translation.de: Ich bin sicher, es ist widerlegt, dass klassische Musik Babys klüger macht.

translation.en: Classical music makes everybody smarter,
which I need to be to build this crib.
translation.de: Das brauche ich für den Aufbau des Betts.

translation.en: Instruction manual's more complicated than differential calculus.
translation.de: Die Anleitung ist komplizierter als Differentialrechnung.

translation.en: Hey, Pop.
Hey Peanut. I'm almost packed.
translation.de: Hey, Kleine. Bin fast fertig mit Packen.

translation.en: What's cracking in Aldovania?
You still can't say it right. Pack warmly, it's cold here.
translation.de: -Du sagst es immer noch falsch. -Pack warme Sachen ein.

translation.en: Now why couldn't you marry the king of some tropical paradise?
translation.de: Warum hast du keinen König eines Tropenparadieses geheiratet?

translation.en: -She sunburns too easily. -[Amber chuckles]
Did you figure out how long you can stay yet?
Gus is gonna cover the diner,
so I can stay from the baby shower all the way until little Rudy's birth.
translation.de: Ich komme zur Babyparty und bleibe bis Klein Rudys Geburt.

translation.en: -Pardon me? -Oops! Sorry.
Prince Rudy's birth.
-Pop! -Hey, I'm just saying.
Amber, what are you doing out here? It's so cold.
translation.de: Amber, was tust du da? Es ist kalt.

translation.en: -Just getting some air. -You should've woken me up.
You need your sleep.
You know, when the baby comes.
What do you have there?
Nothing.
Don't judge my cravings. [chuckles] Never.
What do they call it? Sympathetic weight gain syndrome?
Don't tattle to Dr. Magoro. I'm supposed to watch my sugars.
translation.de: Sag es nicht Dr. Magoro. Ich soll auf Zucker achten.

translation.en: You have my word.
[Dr. Magoro] Fetal heart rate excellent.
Amniotic fluid levels superb.
-Your baby is beautiful. -[Richard chuckles]
Going forward, anything special we should do?
translation.de: Müssen wir auf etwas Besonderes achten?

translation.en: Avoid special as much as possible.
Queen Amber needs her rest and relaxation, nothing more.
translation.de: Königin Amber braucht Ruhe und Entspannung, nichts weiter.

translation.en: -That sounds ideal. -[door opens]
Hello, can we get a peek?
I'd love to see my little grandchild.
Can you print a copy for auntie Mel?
If you want to know if it's a boy or a girl, you'll be disappointed.
translation.de: Ihr werdet das Geschlecht nicht erfahren.

translation.en: -Foiled again. -[Richard chuckles]
Try harder next time.
Just what the doctor ordered.
Nothing is more important right now -than time to ourselves. -[thud]
translation.de: Nichts ist jetzt wichtiger Zeit für uns.

translation.en: To quote your sister, I'm not a china doll.
translation.de: Deine Schwester sagt, ich sei keine Porzellanpuppe.

translation.en: No, you're far more valuable.
I want you both to have the best of everything, including sleigh rides.
translation.de: Nur das Beste für euch zwei. Auch Schlittenfahrten.

translation.en: I've been thinking,
and I want this baby to have a normal life, as normal as possible.
translation.de: Das Baby soll ein normales Leben führen. So normal wie möglich.

translation.en: Our child will be heir to the Kingdom.
Still, I went to public school, I played with neighborhood kids.
translation.de: Ich ging zur Schule, spielte mit den Nachbarskindern.

translation.en: I went to boarding school and played polo.
I was riding a subway by myself when I was ten, and I ate diner food.
translation.de: Ich fuhr mit zehn allein U-Bahn und aß Diner-Essen.

translation.en: I had nannies to make sure I ate my vegetables.
translation.de: Nannys sorgten dafür, dass ich Gemüse esse.

translation.en: -I turned out all right. -So did I.
We'll find a new definition of normal together.
-No boarding school. -No boarding school.
[inhales] But no subway riding, either.
Well, luckily for you, Aldovia doesn't have a subway.
translation.de: Zum Glück gibt's in Aldovien keine U-Bahn.

translation.en: Your Majesties,
with an eye to the Penglians' official visit and treaty signing
translation.de: Damit der Besuch der Penglianer und der Vertragsabschluss

translation.en: proceeding as smoothly as possible,
we feel a review is prudent.
Thank you for making the time.
Well, this is the last of the time you will get of our Queen,
translation.de: Das ist das letzte Mal, dass sich unsere Königin Zeit nimmt.

translation.en: for the rest of the year will be dedicated exclusively
translation.de: Der Rest des Jahres gilt ausschließlich den Vorbereitungen

translation.en: to the preparations for the birth of the royal baby.
translation.de: auf die Geburt des königlichen Babys.

translation.en: Of course.
The centennial treaty
renews an ancient truce between Aldovia and Penglia
translation.de: verlängert den Waffenstillstand zwischen Aldovien und Penglien,

translation.en: that dates back to a war 600 years ago.
translation.de: der auf einen Krieg von vor 600 Jahren zurückgeht.

translation.en: That was the war over Silk Road trading routes, right?
You've studied your history, Queen Amber.
translation.de: Ihr kennt Euch aus, Königin Amber.

translation.en: [Mr. Little] It was a fearsome and brutal war with no end in sight.
translation.de: Es war ein schlimmer und brutaler Krieg ohne ein absehbares Ende.

translation.en: -[mellow flute instrumentals] -Finally, on Christmas Eve 1419,
Prince Claude of Aldovia and Prince Jun of Penglia,
translation.de: fanden Prinz Claude von Aldovien und Prinz Jun von Penglien,

translation.en: inspired by the season of peace and goodwill, found a way to end the conflict.
translation.de: inspiriert von der Zeit des Friedens, einen Weg, den Konflikt zu beenden.

translation.en: Just before midnight, on that fateful Christmas Eve 1419,
translation.de: Kurz vor Mitternacht an jenem schicksalhaften Heiligabend 1419

translation.en: the truce was declared and the treaty signed.
translation.de: wurde der Waffenstillstand erklärt und der Vertrag unterzeichnet.

translation.en: The treaty, your Majesties.
To honor the peace and friendship between our nations,
translation.de: Um Frieden und Freundschaft unserer Nationen zu ehren,

translation.en: the treaty has been ceremonially renewed every 100 years since, without fail.
translation.de: wird der Waffenstillstand alle 100 Jahre ohne Unterbrechung erneuert.

translation.en: -[mellow flute instrumentals continue] -The artistry is incredible.
[Richard] It's a treasured artifact.
It's been under our protection since 1919.
And after the signing, it goes back to Penglia for the next hundred years.
translation.de: Und nach der Unterzeichnung bleibt er hundert Jahre in Penglien.

translation.en: It's beautiful, with the signatures of every king.
translation.de: Wunderschön, mit den Unterschriften aller Könige.

translation.en: [inhales] I'll be the first queen to sign it. You will, indeed.
As long as the royals from Penglia agree.
[stammers] Whilst Aldovia boldly plunges into the 21st Century,
translation.de: Während Aldovien mutig ins 21. Jahrhundert vorstößt,

translation.en: this treaty dates back to the 15th Century.
translation.de: stammt dieser Vertrag aus dem 15. Jahrhundert.

translation.en: We'll have to proceed very carefully, Amber.
The Penglians are our closest allies but,
translation.de: Die Penglianer sind unsere engsten Verbündeten,

translation.en: in many respects, they are quite traditional.
translation.de: aber sie sind oft sehr traditionell.

translation.en: -[Amber chuckles] -An attitude personified by the Queen of Penglia, Queen Ming.
translation.de: Diese Haltung verkörpert die Königin von Penglien, Königin Ming.

translation.en: Compared to Queen Ming, even Mrs. Averill comes off as rather carefree.
translation.de: Im Vergleich zu Königin Ming erscheint sogar Mrs. Averill unbekümmert.

translation.en: [Mrs. Averill] I have my carefree moments.
I had one last Sunday. [chuckles]
I love a challenge. I can't wait to meet Queen Ming.
translation.de: Ich mag Herausforderungen. Ich freue mich auf Königin Ming.

translation.en: They shall be here momentarily.
[Mrs. Averill] Now come on, everybody. Move into place, quickly.
Once they exit, meet them in the center. King Richard will give a formal greeting.
translation.de: Wenn sie aussteigen, geht zu Ihnen. König Richard wird sie formell begrüßen.

translation.en: Welcome to Aldovia.
A most hearty welcome.
We're here to celebrate a hand clasp on a battlefield 600 years ago.
translation.de: Wir feiern einen 600 Jahre alten Handschlag auf einem Schlachtfeld.

translation.en: That changed the fate of both our nations.
translation.de: Der das Schicksal unserer Nationen änderte.

translation.en: -[cameras shutter] -[chuckles] King Richard, so glad to finally meet you in person.
translation.de: König Richard, schön, Sie persönlich kennenzulernen.

translation.en: Good to see you too, King Tai.
May I introduce my wife, Queen Amber.
translation.de: Das ist meine Frau, Königin Amber.

translation.en: An honor. You're as lovely and charming as they say.
translation.de: Eine Ehre. So reizend und charmant wie Euer Ruf.

translation.en: My wife, Queen Ming of Penglia.
translation.de: Meine Frau, Königin Ming von Penglien.

translation.en: -Queen Ming. -I'm most pleased to be here.
And to finally lay eyes on the famous Queen Amber of New York.
translation.de: Endlich sehe ich die berühmte Königin Amber von New York.

translation.en: Wonderful to meet you, Queen Ming. And you.
translation.de: Sehr erfreut, Königin Ming. Gilt auch für Sie.

translation.en: I'm Amber, hi.
Lynn is our attaché.
Fantastic!
Beautiful.
No one does Christmas like the Aldovians.
translation.de: Keiner feiert Weihnachten wie die Aldovier.

translation.en: Thank you. We do our best.
If Emily had her way, we'd have a tree in every room.
translation.de: Ging's nach Emily, wäre in jedem Raum ein Baum.

translation.en: Actually, I believe you do.
translation.de: Ich glaube, so ist es auch.

translation.en: Indeed, Tom.
-We have quite a bit of mistletoe too. -[Tom gulps]
[Simon, laughing] That's spectacular.
So, how do you two know each other?
We studied together, Oxford. I studied. Simon... caroused.
translation.de: -Wir haben in Oxford studiert. -Ich habe studiert. Simon hat gefeiert.

translation.en: I may have enjoyed the occasional night out,
but I'm not the one whose picture... -Hey, hey, hey! -...is hanging in the King's Arms Pub.
translation.de: aber es hängt nicht mein Bild im King's Arms Pub.

translation.en: [man] Red for you, your Highness.
And sparkling water for you, Your Majesty.
Thank you, Mr Zabala.
It appears you've adapted comfortably to your new role.
translation.de: Ihr scheint Euch an die neue Rolle gewöhnt zu haben.

translation.en: I like to think so.
Not to say there haven't been growing pains.
What with the Belgravians here, in Aldovia, as well,
translation.de: Bei den Belgraviern und auch in Aldovien

translation.en: it seems royals marrying outside of noble classes
translation.de: scheint das Heiraten von Personen außerhalb der Noblesse

translation.en: has become quite fashionable.
And now your first child -on the way. Congratulations. -[Amber chuckles]
translation.de: Und jetzt ist das erste Kind unterwegs. Glückwunsch.

translation.en: Providing your kingdom with an heir
is historically a Queen's utmost duty.
translation.de: ist die größte Pflicht der Königin.

translation.en: [stammers] Oh, I don't see it as a duty at all.
translation.de: Ich sehe es nicht als Pflicht.

translation.en: Richard and I are simply excited to start our family.
translation.de: Richard und ich freuen uns, eine Familie zu gründen.

translation.en: You have three children of your own?
Yes. Harry is 13. Vivian and Amanda are ten.
translation.de: Ja. Harry ist 13. Vivian und Amanda sind zehn.

translation.en: Twins? I can't even imagine. [laughs]
I have to admit, I was excited to finally meet the playboy prince.
translation.de: Zugegeben, ich freute mich darauf, den Playboy-Prinzen kennenzulernen.

translation.en: -[Richard chuckles] -I enjoyed living vicariously through your exploits in the press.
translation.de: Ich genoss es stellvertretend, von Euren Skandalen zu lesen.

translation.en: It's all greatly exaggerated.
I was actually hoping to talk some business with you.
Business? Quite honestly, I prefer to leave that tedium to Lynn.
translation.de: Über Geschäftliches? Ehrlich gesagt, dieses Langweilerthema überlasse ich Lynn.

translation.en: Congratulations on your new position, very impressive.
It's a start, but I soon hope to be accomplishing more.
translation.de: Für den Anfang. Ich will mehr erreichen.

translation.en: Ambitious as ever. [playfully scoffs]
What's your role at the palace?
Cousin to the King, but you know me, working the angles.
translation.de: Cousin des Königs. Aber ich verfolge eigene Interessen.

translation.en: -Oh, you always do. [laughs] -[Simon laughs]
[scoffs] Pardon me, got to take this. Angles of my own.
translation.de: Verzeihung, ich muss rangehen. Eigene Interessen.

translation.en: [inhales] She's a live wire.
Enjoying yourself?
-[stammers] Of course, yeah. -[Richard exhales in relief]
Are you familiar with Aldovia's modernization efforts?
I'm familiar with all aspects of Aldovia's policy.
translation.de: Ich kenne alle Aspekte von Aldoviens Politik.

translation.en: Given its success, I spoke with Richard and
translation.de: Angesichts des Erfolges sprach ich mit Richard.

translation.en: we feel that you and I should add our signatures to the treaty.
translation.de: Wir finden, Ihr und ich sollten ebenfalls unterzeichnen.

translation.en: You wish to modernize our 600 year old tradition?
translation.de: Ihr wollt unsere 600 Jahre alte Tradition modernisieren?

translation.en: We, the Queens, could bring the tradition up to date.
History isn't made by those who follow rules.
[Mr. Little] Your Majesties.
May I announce the arrival of the CEO and the Chief Designer from S & A Events International.
translation.de: Hier ist der CEO und Chefdesigner von S & A Events International.

translation.en: -Your Majesties. -It's a pleasure to be here.
[Andy] Wow, look at you.
You've never looked more beautiful.
translation.de: Du siehst schöner aus denn je.

translation.en: So this is what you've been doing? Your secret project?
translation.de: Das hast du also gemacht? Dein geheimes Projekt?

translation.en: Consider Andrew and myself early Christmas gifts.
translation.de: Betrachte Andrew und mich als frühe Weihnachtsgeschenke.

translation.en: Weddings were too small a niche for such a big talent.
translation.de: Hochzeiten werden seinem Talent nicht gerecht.

translation.en: We rebranded and expanded Sahil's business.
translation.de: Wir haben Sahils Firma umbenannt und erweitert.

translation.en: I was happy to give Andrew the opportunity.
translation.de: Ich gab Andrew gern diese Chance.

translation.en: Design genius meets management expertise.
Mrs. Averill engaged us to make sure that you had the most spectacular royal baby shower of all time.
translation.de: Mrs. Averill beauftragte uns mit der gigantischsten Babyparty aller Zeiten.

translation.en: -You deserve it. -Thanks.
May I also offer our service, free of charge, to the elevation of tomorrow's treaty signing?
translation.de: Dürften wir kostenlos für einen stilvolleren Vertragsschluss sorgen?

translation.en: Elevation?
I have seen the artifact. It's a bit tacky, no? [laughs]
translation.de: Ich habe das Artefakt gesehen. Es ist etwas kitschig, oder?

translation.en: It's a priceless work of art.
We will be standing by if you need us.
translation.de: Wir sind bereit, falls man uns braucht.

translation.en: Great.
[Amber] Next question.
During labor I would like to spend the first stage
translation.de: Will ich bei den Wehen die erste Phase

translation.en: lying down, standing up, walking around, in the shower or in the tub?
translation.de: liegend, stehend, gehend, in der Dusche oder Wanne verbringen?

translation.en: Lying down.
Walking around. New York, born and raised.
Never realized labour came in multiple choice.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, dass man eine Wahl hat.

translation.en: Testing. Testing. Can you hear me?
I can hear you.
Let's test it for real.
Extraordinary.
-Are you seeing this? -Yeah.
-[Amber sighs in frustration] -Can you still see me?
-[Amber chuckles] -Amber, hello?
This is unbelievable.
You're right. This is amazing.
translation.de: Du hast recht, es ist fantastisch.

translation.en: Should we try from the nursery?
Now transmitting from the nursery.
-Can you hear me? -[Amber playful groans over monitor]
-Amber, hello? Are you there? -[whimpering over monitor]
I need a little help.
-Is that crying? Amber? -[whimpering continues]
-[exhales] -What is it? I can't even reach my own slippers.
translation.de: -Was ist los? -Ich komme nicht mal an meine Hausschuhe.

translation.en: Allow me.
Perfect fit.
Cinderella was a bit more graceful.
But nowhere near as beautiful.
[Queen Ming] This storm could spell disaster.
Where's Lynn? I asked for an update four minutes ago.
translation.de: Wo ist Lynn? Ich bat vor vier Minuten um ein Update.

translation.en: Apologies, Queen Ming. I was speaking to the pilot.
translation.de: Verzeihung, Königin Ming. Ich sprach mit dem Piloten.

translation.en: And? The storm brought the country to a standstill.
All flights have been canceled.
How would this affect the treaty signing? The Aldovians wish to proceed the ceremony as scheduled.
translation.de: -Und die Vertragsunterzeichnung? -Die Aldovier wollen wie geplant vorgehen.

translation.en: I agree.
Very well. Find us a way home directly afterwards.
translation.de: Also gut. Direkt danach wollen wir nach Hause.

translation.en: Our children expect us back.
Yes.
[Queen Helena] Such a shame there are so few guests to witness this beautiful event.
translation.de: Schade, dass so wenige Gäste diesem schönen Ereignis beiwohnen.

translation.en: Yes, I'm afraid no one's been able to travel anywhere today, Your Majesty.
translation.de: Leider konnte heute niemand herreisen, Eure Majestät.

translation.en: Your Majesties.
As expected, the Penglians have officially rejected
translation.de: Wie erwartet lehnten die Penglianer offiziell ab,

translation.en: -either queen signing the treaty. -[Richard inhales deeply]
[exhales slowly] I'm sorry.
In a few minutes, this will all be over and then we can focus on what's most important.
translation.de: Gleich ist alles vorbei, und wir konzentrieren uns aufs Wichtigste.

translation.en: You and the baby.
There's a little too much red.
I think they can do with a little bit more blue, -to be honest. -Yeah.
translation.de: Wir könnten alle etwas mehr Blau vertragen.

translation.en: [Sahil] I'm thinking royal blue.
Mm... Yeah. Could work.
In honor of the sacred treaty,
signed on the battlefield on Christmas Eve in the year 1419,
translation.de: unterzeichnet auf dem Schlachtfeld am Heiligabend des Jahres 1419,

translation.en: the monarchy of Aldovia welcomes King Tai and Queen Ming of Penglia.
translation.de: heißt die Monarchie Aldoviens König Tai und Königin Ming von Penglien willkommen.

translation.en: No. No, no, no.
It is my great honor and privilege
translation.de: Es ist mir eine Ehre und ein Privileg,

translation.en: to preside over the seventh signing of the sacred truce between our realms.
translation.de: den siebten Waffenstillstand zwischen unseren Reichen zu leiten.

translation.en: The entire Kingdom of Aldovia
heartily embraces our alliance with Penglia.
What began as a handshake on Christmas Eve
translation.de: Was als Handschlag an Heiligabend begann,

translation.en: has evolved into an ever-growing bond
translation.de: hat sich zu einer wachsenden Bindung entwickelt,

translation.en: represented by our invaluable, ever-expanding precious treaty.
translation.de: repräsentiert durch unser unschätzbares, wachsendes und wertvolles Abkommen.

translation.en: Mr. Little, let the signing begin.
translation.de: Mr. Little, lassen Sie die Unterzeichnung beginnen.

translation.en: How is this possible?
Where's the treaty? It's supposed to be there.
translation.de: Wo ist der Vertrag? Er muss da sein.

translation.en: We do apologize.
I'm sure we can get this little mix-up straightened out right away.
translation.de: Wir können das Missverständnis sicher sofort aufklären.

translation.en: Well this is certainly embarrassing.
If we don't sort this out, we'll all end up in the dungeon.
translation.de: Wenn wir das nicht klären, landen wir alle im Verlies.

translation.en: Indeed.
Perhaps now it can be replaced with something more palatable.
translation.de: Vielleicht könnte er durch etwas Schöneres ersetzt werden.

translation.en: There must be an explanation.
Does anyone have any idea what's going on?
The treaty was there last night when we checked.
translation.de: Der Vertrag war gestern noch da.

translation.en: -I can confirm. -And now it's vanished.
I've been saying that we should update the security protocols ever since...
well, you infiltrated the palace.
But no one has come or gone since the blizzard.
translation.de: Seit dem Blizzard ist niemand gekommen oder gegangen.

translation.en: So the treaty must still be in the palace.
translation.de: Der Vertrag muss im Palast sein.

translation.en: Along with whoever took it.
-[hushed] What do we do now? -[hushed] I don't know--
[Richard] Simon.
[sighs] We need your help.
You're kidding.
Well, I'd be delighted. What can I do for my king and queen?
translation.de: Sehr gern. Was kann ich tun für meinen König und meine Königin?

translation.en: Find a way to occupy our guests while we locate the treaty.
translation.de: Unterhalte die Gäste, wir suchen den Vertrag.

translation.en: [hushed] It's okay, we'll make sure-- I'll make sure everything's sorted.
translation.de: Alles gut. Ich kümmere mich um alles.

translation.en: And how am I to do that?
You're friends with Lynn. Keep them entertained.
translation.de: Du bist mit Lynn befreundet. Unterhalte sie.

translation.en: Lynn's easy to entertain. Not so sure about the others.
translation.de: Lynn ist leicht zu unterhalten. Beim Rest bin ich unsicher.

translation.en: [hushed] One thing is for certain.
Just stick with Simon and make sure he doesn't do anything Simon-like.
translation.de: Bleib bei Simon. Er soll nichts Simonartiges tun.

translation.en: I'll be your eyes and ears.
I know what might be a bit of fun.
Is this some kind of game?
Top of the tree, a classic Aldovian Christmas game.
translation.de: "Schmück den Baum", ein traditionelles Spiel in Aldovien.

translation.en: Wow, I haven't played this since I was a kid. [chuckles] Shockingly good idea, Simon.
translation.de: -Das hab ich als Kind zuletzt gespielt. -Eine erschreckend gute Idee.

translation.en: Two teams compete,
the goal being to decorate your side of the tree first.
translation.de: Das Ziel ist, seine Seite zuerst dekoriert zu haben.

translation.en: The team that places the star on top of the tree wins.
translation.de: Wer den Stern auf die Spitze setzt, gewinnt.

translation.en: You want us to play a children's game in the midst of this scandal?
translation.de: Ihr wollt inmitten des Skandals ein Kinderspiel spielen?

translation.en: Well, it's an unfortunate delay, it's not really a scandal, yet.
translation.de: Es ist eine unglückliche Verzögerung, aber noch lange kein Skandal.

translation.en: Simon has a great talent for games.
translation.de: Simon hat ein großes Talent für Spiele.

translation.en: -He's definitely talented at many things. -[Simon laughs uneasily]
translation.de: Er ist in vielen Dingen talentiert.

translation.en: Ornaments are awarded for answering questions
translation.de: Man bekommt Deko-Elemente, indem man Fragen

translation.en: about famous royal traditions and legends.
Count me in.
Our children would enjoy this. I'll go and inform them about the delay.
translation.de: Unseren Kindern würde das gefallen. Ich informiere sie über die Verspätung.

translation.en: Of course.
It's a pity though, we should have even teams.
Well, I'm happy to sit out if it helps.
I'm not exactly a whiz at royal traditions yet.
translation.de: Ich kenne mich noch nicht mit königlichen Traditionen aus.

translation.en: I'll join King Tai. I embrace any opportunity to beat Simon.
translation.de: Ich gehe zu König Tai. Ich trete gern gegen Simon an.

translation.en: -I like your spirit, Princess. -[chair creaks]
Well, guess that makes it... [exhales]
you and me. [chuckles]
-Would you like to start? -Yes, please.
Any luck?
Not yet. [sighs]
We know the treaty was here last night.
translation.de: Der Vertrag war gestern noch hier.

translation.en: We know that nobody's entered or left the palace.
Are you proposing we make a list of suspects?
Investigative journalism 101.
The treaty didn't fly away on its own.
translation.de: Der Vertrag verschwand nicht von allein.

translation.en: Did you notice the look that Simon and Lynn exchanged when the treaty went missing?
translation.de: Hast du Simons und Lynns Blick gesehen, als der Vertrag weg war?

translation.en: And Sahil called it tacky. I wouldn't put it past him.
translation.de: Sahil nannte ihn kitschig. Ich traue es ihm zu.

translation.en: Who in this palace had the means, the opportunity, the motive?
translation.de: Wer in diesem Palast hätte Mittel, Gelegenheit und Motiv?

translation.en: -Did you take it? -No.
Neither did I. That's two down. Very funny.
[scoffs] This is an easy one.
In the legend "Princess Froon," Grendel's pet is what animal?
translation.de: In der Legende Prinzessin Froon hat Grendel welches Haustier?

translation.en: [scoffs] Even I know this one, from your Christmas pageant.
translation.de: Das weiß ich von deinem Krippenspiel.

translation.en: -Don't you dare say. -Turtle!
-Yes, well played. One more and we win. -[Lynn squeals in delight]
translation.de: Ja, gut gemacht. Noch eins, und wir gewinnen.

translation.en: Tweet, tweet, tweet.
-That is beautiful. -[Lynn laughs]
Do you see that, Melissa, what she made? It's amazing. I can make you one.
translation.de: -Melissa, siehst du das? Unglaublich. -Ich bastle dir einen.

translation.en: Actually, I need to get some air.
translation.de: Ich muss mal an die frische Luft.

translation.en: Melissa! Melissa... Wait!
We should probably check on Ming.
translation.de: Wir sollten mal nach Ming sehen.

translation.en: A pity, Princess Emily, we would have won.
translation.de: Schade, Prinzessin Emily, wir hätten gewonnen.

translation.en: Sorry.
This game was a favorite in my family, too.
translation.de: Dieses Spiel war auch in meiner Familie beliebt.

translation.en: Final question.
Who was Aldovia's greatest king and father?
translation.de: Wer war Aldoviens größter König und Vater?

translation.en: That isn't a real question.
But you know the answer.
My father.
The star.
You win. Will you do the honors?
As you wish.
-[indistinct conversation] -Hey!
Where are you going?
Simon and I need some alone time.
translation.de: Simon und ich brauchen Zeit für uns.

translation.en: Melissa suggested a walk in the snow.
What about the Penglians?
Well Emily's more than capable and my priority is Melissa.
translation.de: Emily kann das besser, und Melissa ist meine Priorität.

translation.en: Mel, can we talk a sec?
Yeah, sure.
I'll see about clearing a path.
-[kissing sound] -My hero!
What's up?
Well, you and Simon, for one thing. I never realized you were so close.
translation.de: Also erstens: du und Simon. Seit wann steht ihr euch so nahe?

translation.en: We talk for hours every night.
He's really smart,
funny, super cute and really misunderstood.
translation.de: witzig, total süß und wirklich missverstanden.

translation.en: Misunderstood?
Mel, all your bad boys have left you heartbroken.
translation.de: All deine bösen Jungs brachen dir das Herz.

translation.en: He's more than just a bad boy.
He cares about me.
It's starting to feel real, you know?
translation.de: Es fühlt sich echt an, weißt du?

translation.en: We are just worried about his intentions. Have you seen the way he looks at Lynn?
translation.de: Wir sorgen uns wegen seiner Absichten. Weißt du, wie er Lynn ansieht?

translation.en: He swears Lynn is just a friend.
translation.de: Er schwört, sie sind nur Freunde.

translation.en: I don't know, sometimes I get a little insecure, out of my depth with royals, you get that.
translation.de: Manchmal bin ich unsicher und überfordert, wenn es um die Königsfamilie geht.

translation.en: Yeah, but you don't know Simon like we do. And you don't know Simon like I do.
translation.de: -Du kennst ihn nicht so gut wie wir. -Und du nicht so wie ich.

translation.en: I appreciate you looking out for me, -but Simon and I... -[dramatic instrumentals]
translation.de: Schön, dass du auf mich aufpasst, aber Simon und ich...

translation.en: we're in love.
Not just like a lot or heavily infatuated?
translation.de: Und es ist nicht bloß Verknalltsein?

translation.en: I want it to work.
[clicks tongue] I hear you.
Has the treaty been found?
It pains me to say no, Your Majesty.
translation.de: Es schmerzt, das zu verneinen, Eure Majestät.

translation.en: After our initial survey, we can assume it's nowhere obvious.
translation.de: Nach einer ersten Einschätzung nehmen wir an, er ist versteckt.

translation.en: Your Majesty, please, be assured
no one will rest until it's located.
translation.de: wir ruhen erst, wenn er gefunden ist.

translation.en: Thank you.
Because, according to the treaty's terms,
if it's not renewed by midnight on Christmas Eve,
translation.de: wird er am Heiligabend nicht bis Mitternacht erneuert,

translation.en: Aldovia and Penglia technically return to a state of war.
translation.de: führen Aldovien und Penglien wieder Krieg.

translation.en: Should be interesting, as neither country has a standing army.
translation.de: Wird spannend. Keines der beiden Länder hat eine Armee.

translation.en: Emily, I thought you were with our guests.
translation.de: Du solltest bei den Gästen sein.

translation.en: Simon had to end the game abruptly. They've returned to their rooms.
translation.de: Simon beendete das Spiel. Sie sind in ihre Zimmer gegangen.

translation.en: This situation is just so inelegant.
Please, continue to search.
Your Majesty.
Is this about the treaty? Mother, did you read this?
translation.de: Hier geht's um den Vertrag? Mutter, hast du das gelesen?

translation.en: "If there comes a day the sacred truce is broken,
translation.de: "Wird eines Tages der heilige Frieden gebrochen,

translation.en: the Kingdom disrupting the peace shall suffer a dreadful fate:
translation.de: ereilt das Reich, das den Frieden stört, ein übles Schicksal:

translation.en: upon the firstborn a beshrew."
What's a beshrew?
[scoffs] It's a curse.
People believed in things like that back then.
translation.de: Man glaubte damals an so etwas.

translation.en: How did it work?
A sorceress would conjure a spell
to ensure that the two kingdoms upheld the treaty.
translation.de: damit beide Reiche den Vertrag aufrechterhalten.

translation.en: So, if we don't sign the treaty by Christmas Eve,
there'll be a curse on the firstborn child?
That's Amber and Richard's baby.
Sorcery fell out of favor centuries ago.
translation.de: Magie fiel vor Jahrhunderten in Ungnade.

translation.en: Emily, we're not going to bother anyone with this nonsense.
translation.de: Wir werden keinen mit dem Unsinn behelligen.

translation.en: But what if it isn't nonsense?
translation.de: Und wenn es kein Unsinn ist?

translation.en: [Richard] What is it?
Baby's kicking a lot.
Amazing. Little striker in there.
More likely upset about my chat with Melissa.
translation.de: Ihn ärgert mein Gespräch mit Melissa.

translation.en: Does Simon have an alibi?
No idea, but she thinks he's a great guy, says they're in love.
translation.de: Weiß nicht. Sie mag ihn sehr und sagt, sie sind verliebt.

translation.en: Love is blind.
Perhaps sleuthing while pregnant isn't the best idea.
translation.de: Schwanger zu ermitteln, ist keine gute Idee.

translation.en: I may be expecting and Queen,
translation.de: Ich mag eine schwangere Königin sein,

translation.en: but I'm still a journalist.
And right now, my investigation needs your help.
Not now, Andrew. I'm in the zone, designing.
translation.de: Nicht jetzt, Andrew. Ich muss mich konzentrieren.

translation.en: -Andrew! -[paper whooshes]
Andrew--
Your Majesty.
Please, come-- come in.
Sorry to disturb you, Sahil.
I have a design question about the nursery. Do you have a moment?
translation.de: Ich habe eine Designfrage zum Kinderzimmer. Hast du Zeit?

translation.en: Now? [stammers] Of course, Your Majesty.
I appreciate this.
It's about the best location for the crib, given the layout.
translation.de: Es geht um den besten Stellplatz fürs Bett.

translation.en: Spatial flow is absolutely crucial.
I have studied the Aztecs, Mongols and Zulus to arrive at my own theories.
translation.de: Ich studierte Azteken, Mongolen und Zulus und entwickelte eigene Theorien.

translation.en: -I should get my tape measure. -No, no, no, no!
[stammering] I mean I have a royal tape measure waiting for us.
translation.de: Es wartet ein königliches Maßband auf uns.

translation.en: I am envisioning monochrome with geometric prints.
translation.de: Ich stelle mir monochrome, geometrische Muster vor.

translation.en: -Sahil? -[knocking]
Hi, Eddie. [stammers] Andrew.
-Amber. -[exhales] Is Sahil here?
-[stammering] No, I was just-- -Just...
[sighs] Helping with the search.
Sahil called the treaty tacky. I went too far. Don't be mad at me.
translation.de: Sahil nannte den Vertrag kitschig. Ich übertrieb. Sei nicht böse.

translation.en: [laughs] Mad?
Look, I work with the guy daily.
translation.de: Ich arbeite täglich mit dem Kerl.

translation.en: I get it. He's opinionated.
It was a lead. We follow leads, remember?
translation.de: Es war eine Spur. Spuren verfolgt man.

translation.en: I do, it's just we have a multi-million dollar business now and Sahil would never risk it.
translation.de: Wir haben ein Millionengeschäft, Sahil würde das nie riskieren.

translation.en: Multi-million dollars, really? Yeah. So if you wanna write a story, write about us.
translation.de: -Millionen? Ehrlich? -Du willst schreiben? Schreib über uns.

translation.en: -Like a puff piece? -Exactly.
-After the baby, of course. -Of course.
[exhales] Tell me you had success.
Thanks to your little ruse, the last hour's felt like a month.
translation.de: Dank deines Plans fühlte sich eine Stunde wie ein Monat an.

translation.en: -Once Sahil gets in the zone-- -He didn't take it.
You're right, I don't need to focus on this missing treaty.
translation.de: Du hast recht. Der Vertrag sollte nicht meine Priorität sein.

translation.en: [Richard] No, you absolutely don't.
Actually, you do.
I'm not meant to tell you this because it's probably rubbish.
translation.de: Ich soll nichts sagen, weil es wohl Unsinn ist.

translation.en: But... a curse will befall the King and Queen responsible for breaking the treaty.
translation.de: Aber das verantwortliche Königspaar wird ein Fluch heimsuchen.

translation.en: Seriously? A curse?
Concocted by a sorceress to ensure the treaty wasn't broken.
translation.de: Von einer Zauberin, damit der Vertrag eingehalten wird.

translation.en: Sorcery. Hardly a cause for concern.
If the treaty isn't signed in time, by midnight Christmas Eve,
translation.de: Wird der Vertrag nicht bis Mitternacht am Heiligabend unterzeichnet,

translation.en: it takes effect.
Why are you putting stock in this nonsense?
It's a curse on your firstborn.
On this baby?
Our baby.
According to the history book. The chance of this being real is infinitesimal.
translation.de: -Laut Geschichtsbuch. -Die Chance, dass es stimmt, ist winzig.

translation.en: I don't care if it's one in a billion, I'm not risking it.
translation.de: Egal, wie klein die Chance ist, ich riskiere nichts.

translation.en: We need to find this treaty.
[woman over PA] Attention, flight 1225 -[planes flying overhead] -to Aldovia is still canceled.
translation.de: Achtung, der Flug 1225 nach Aldovien ist noch immer gecancelt.

translation.en: Eh, no clue when they'll start letting flights in,
translation.de: Keine Ahnung, wann der erste Flug geht,

translation.en: but I'll be on the first one as soon as they do.
How about you guys, how you doing?
Honestly, disaster on all fronts.
Melissa is in love with Simon.
We have to cancel tomorrow's baby shower, the treaty is missing
translation.de: Wir müssen die Babyparty absagen, der Vertrag ist weg.

translation.en: and if we don't find it by midnight on Christmas Eve, our baby is cursed.
translation.de: Finden wir ihn nicht bis Heiligabend vor Mitternacht, ist das Baby verflucht.

translation.en: Hold on, you're gonna have to explain that one.
translation.de: Warte, das musst du mir erklären.

translation.en: -It's a long story. -Emphasis on story,
and we have until Christmas Eve to sort it out. -Tomorrow's only the 23rd. -[Rudy exhales steadily]
translation.de: Es muss bis Heiligabend geklärt sein. Morgen ist erst der 23.

translation.en: Well, I don't know much about this supernatural stuff,
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht viel über übernatürliches Zeug,

translation.en: but go easy on Melissa, huh?
translation.de: aber sei nicht so streng mit Melissa.

translation.en: Love makes people do funny things.
translation.de: Die Liebe lässt uns verrückte Dinge tun.

translation.en: You gave up New York slices and bagels for meat jelly.
translation.de: Du gabst New Yorker Pizza und Bagels für Pastete auf.

translation.en: Oh! Could you please bring me some bagels?
translation.de: Bringst du mir bitte Bagels mit?

translation.en: You got it.
Now, why'd you cancel your baby shower?
translation.de: Warum sagt ihr eure Babyparty ab?

translation.en: No one can get here. The storm.
translation.de: Durch den Sturm kommt kein Besuch her.

translation.en: There's plenty of people in the palace. Have it anyway.
translation.de: Es gibt viele Leute im Palast. Feiert trotzdem.

translation.en: It just doesn't feel like the right time.
translation.de: Es fühlt sich nicht richtig an.

translation.en: From what you're saying, sounds like a little hope and joy is just what the palace needs.
translation.de: Was ihr sagt, klingt, als brauche der Palast Hoffnung und Spaß.

translation.en: Have the shower.
[Emily, echoing] A curse upon the firstborn,
upon the firstborn...
[hushed] Richard.
[Amber] The Royal Scandal of the Fathers of the Silk Road Treaty.
Royal scandal?
Did you know there was a love triangle
between Prince Claude and Prince Jun over Claude's newlywed, Princess Jocelyn?
translation.de: zwischen Prinz Claude, Prinz Jun und Claudes Braut Prinzessin Jocelyn?

translation.en: I believe they taught us that at boarding school.
translation.de: Das hat man uns im Internat beigebracht.

translation.en: Oh my gosh!
Soon after the royal treaty was signed,
Prince Claude was poisoned. Many believed Prince Jun did it.
translation.de: wurde Prinz Claude vergiftet. Man beschuldigte Prinz Jun.

translation.en: The house of Devon, Claude's family, fell out of power
translation.de: Das Haus Devon, Claudes Familie, verlor die Macht,

translation.en: and Claude's descendants swore vengeance.
Why does that name sound familiar?
translation.de: Warum kommt mir das bekannt vor?

translation.en: You're up early, my dear.
Oh, I couldn't sleep.
Baby had a restless night.
One day, you'll look back on all the sleepless nights
translation.de: Später blickst du auf die schlaflosen Nächte zurück

translation.en: and you'll realize -they're amongst your sweetest memories. -[Amber chuckles]
translation.de: und erkennst, es sind wunderbare Erinnerungen.

translation.en: It's a big change, isn't it?
It's the greatest adventure, but your life will never be the same again.
translation.de: Es ist das schönste Abenteuer, aber das Leben verändert sich grundlegend.

translation.en: There are so many things that I wish I could ask my mom.
translation.de: Ich möchte meine Mom so viele Dinge fragen.

translation.en: Amber, never forget that she's right here.
translation.de: Amber, vergiss nie, dass sie hier ist.

translation.en: Her spirit's in you and your baby.
translation.de: Ihr Geist ist in dir und deinem Baby.

translation.en: She gave you good instincts and, through your baby, she'll guide you,
translation.de: Sie gab dir Intuition mit auf den Weg. Durch dein Baby wird sie dich leiten.

translation.en: always.
I'm so grateful I have you.
I'm here.
For anything.
When you were expecting Emily, did you try hypnobirthing?
translation.de: Als du Emily erwartet hast, hast du Hypnobirthing versucht?

translation.en: What on earth is hypnobirthing?
[Dr. Magoro through laptop] Fear causes the body to tense up
and pain in childbirth becomes a self-fulfilling prophecy.
translation.de: Geburtsschmerz ist eine sich selbst erfüllende Prophezeiung.

translation.en: So you're saying no pain is really an option?
translation.de: Sie sagen, es geht ohne Schmerzen?

translation.en: Language is powerful
and we want to have a positive view of birth.
translation.de: Wir wollen die Geburt positiv bewerten.

translation.en: For instance, instead of contractions, we'll call them surges.
translation.de: Zum Beispiel sagen wir Stöße anstatt Wehen.

translation.en: -Surges? -[stammers] Like a surge of energy?
Exactly. Your body is powerful.
And during labor, every surge you feel
translation.de: Und während der Wehen ist jeder Stoß

translation.en: is a wave of relaxation,
pleasure and love.
Lucky you, men don't get those.
translation.de: Sei froh. Männer haben das nicht.

translation.en: I want you both to lie back and close your eyes.
translation.de: Legen Sie sich hin und schließen Sie Ihre Augen.

translation.en: I'm going to lead you into a guided imagery meditation.
translation.de: Ich führe Sie durch eine Bildmeditation.

translation.en: Imagine a surge,
translation.de: Stellen Sie sich einen Stoß vor,

translation.en: relaxation, pleasure, love.
Feel its pulse.
We thought we'd be home by now, too.
translation.de: Ja. Wir wollten längst zu Hause sein.

translation.en: No, you may not peek at your presents.
translation.de: Nein, ihr dürft die Geschenke nicht ansehen.

translation.en: [laughs] We'll be home as soon as we're able.
Love you!
Bye, now.
[sighs] This predicament must be resolved.
If only the children were stuck here with us, wouldn't be so bad.
translation.de: Wären die Kinder hier bei uns, wär's nicht so schlimm.

translation.en: No place is more Christmassy.
Leave it to you to find light in any situation.
translation.de: Du findest an jeder Situation was Positives.

translation.en: I assume that's why you keep me around.
translation.de: Darum bleibst du wohl bei mir.

translation.en: Still, I'd like to find a way home.
translation.de: Ich möchte dennoch gern nach Hause.

translation.en: If we don't stay to sign the truce treaty,
our kingdoms technically return to a state of war.
Of course, a war that would be fought by lawyers. [sighs]
translation.de: Natürlich wäre es nichts als ein Krieg, den Anwälte führen.

translation.en: Just a thought.
What if the Aldovians orchestrated this on purpose?
translation.de: Was, wenn die Aldovier das mit Absicht inszenierten?

translation.en: They want the treaty signed just as much as we do.
translation.de: Sie wollen den Vertrag doch auch.

translation.en: Unless it's a way for them to force an unfair renegotiation of terms.
translation.de: Es sei denn, sie könnten so unfaire Neuverhandlungen erzwingen.

translation.en: Renegotiation under duress?
No.
[Mr. Zabala] Good day, Your Majesties.
Forgive me, am I interrupting?
Not at all.
May I present, with the compliments and best wishes of Queen Amber of Aldovia.
translation.de: Bitte sehr, mit den besten Wünschen von Königin Amber von Aldovien.

translation.en: Thank you and good day.
Hm. An invitation to attend Queen Amber's royal baby shower.
translation.de: KÖNIGLICHE BABYPARTY Eine Einladung zu Königin Ambers königlicher Babyparty.

translation.en: Today.
-[Richard chuckles] -[playfully scoffs] Oh my goodness. It's amazing!
Seriously?
Your Majesty, our gift from S&A Events International.
translation.de: Eure Majestät, unser Geschenk von S & A Events International.

translation.en: Sahil, you have really outdone yourself.
translation.de: Sahil, du hast dich selbst übertroffen.

translation.en: And you, Andy.
-[cheery instrumentals] -We're here to celebrate new life -and strong bonds. -[exclaims of agreement]
translation.de: Wir sind hier, um neues Leben und starke Bindungen zu feiern.

translation.en: Thank you.
Baby guessing game. I love it!
Ladies and gentlemen, please, our Queen.
translation.de: Meine Damen und Herren, unsere Königin.

translation.en: -[group coos] -That's me.
-There I am, there. -[laughter]
[Mr. Zabala] And who is this little cutie?
translation.de: Und wer ist diese kleine Süße?

translation.en: Yeah, that's-- that's me.
[Mr. Zabala] Never would have guessed.
[gasps] Oh my goodness, look at this! -[group coos] -It's so cute!
translation.de: Meine Güte, seht nur! So süß!

translation.en: Thank you so much, guys.
-[cooing] -Will you look at this little bear.
-Oh, that is-- Look at the little ears. -[laughter]
So cute!
For you.
Did you make this?
Today.
Thank you so much.
That's so sweet.
Queen Amber, King Richard. My gift is a song.
translation.de: Königin Amber, König Richard. Mein Geschenk ist ein Lied.

translation.en: ♪ Hark the herald angels sing ♪
♪ Glory to the new born king ♪
♪ Peace on earth and mercy mild ♪
translation.de: Friede auf Erden und milde Gnade

translation.en: ♪ God and sinners reconcile ♪
Thank you.
King Tai played beautifully. [chuckles]
[chuckles, inhales] Everyone adores King Tai. He is the only leader Penglia needs.
translation.de: Alle lieben König Tai. Penglien braucht keinen anderen Anführer.

translation.en: But he's not the only leader Penglia has.
translation.de: Er ist nicht Pengliens einziger Anführer.

translation.en: [playfully scoffs] You and King Richard are truly a team. I do admire that.
translation.de: Ihr und Richard seid wirklich ein Team. Das bewundere ich.

translation.en: I think you deserve more credit.
Credit is not something I seek.
Looks like our queens are getting along nicely. Happy wife, happy life.
translation.de: -Die Königinnen mögen sich. -Glückliche Frau, glückliches Leben.

translation.en: Speaking of which, mind if we slip out for a moment? Sure.
Excuse me.
Please, could you tell me the status on the search of the treaty?
translation.de: Wie steht es um die Suche des Vertrags?

translation.en: Well, we remain certain it's still in the palace.
translation.de: Wir sind uns sicher, dass er noch im Palast ist.

translation.en: King Richard has called for a specially trained police dog to sniff out the artifact.
translation.de: König Richard forderte einen Polizeihund zur Erschnüffelung des Vertrags an.

translation.en: The dog arrives tomorrow morning.
Okay. Thank you.
I promised I'd build the crib on my own but I found the instructions impenetrable.
translation.de: Ich wollte das Bett selbst bauen, aber verstehe die Anleitung nicht.

translation.en: I remember building our baby's crib. [sighs] Took me a month. [chuckles]
translation.de: Ich erinnere mich an unseres. Ich brauchte einen Monat.

translation.en: We each rule a kingdom. This can't be beyond us.
translation.de: Wir regieren Königreiche. Das schaffen wir.

translation.en: -[book thuds closed] -We'll build like we lead, by instinct.
translation.de: Wir bauen und regieren nach Instinkt.

translation.en: [sighs] I never knew how complicated preparing for a baby would be.
translation.de: Ich wusste nicht, wie schwer die Vorbereitung auf ein Baby wird.

translation.en: Did it take you a long time to feel comfortable with fatherhood?
translation.de: Dauerte es lang, sich als Vater zu arrangieren?

translation.en: Only until the birth, then it was automatic. [chuckles]
translation.de: Nur bis zur Geburt, danach ging alles automatisch.

translation.en: I never experienced feeling that type of love before.
translation.de: Ich hatte diese Art von Liebe noch nie erlebt.

translation.en: When the most dire problem in the kingdom pales to a scuffed knee,
translation.de: Wird ein kaputtes Knie wichtiger als politische Probleme,

translation.en: you know you are a parent.
translation.de: weiß man, dass man Vater ist.

translation.en: -[classical "We Three Kings" playing] -I read more of that history book today and you know what?
translation.de: Ich las weiter im Geschichtsbuch. Wisst ihr was?

translation.en: This isn't the first time the treaty's disappeared.
translation.de: Der Vertrag verschwand nicht zum ersten Mal.

translation.en: It's not?
Two hundred years ago, there was another incident, here in Aldovia.
translation.de: Vor 200 Jahren gab es einen weiteren Vorfall hier in Aldovien.

translation.en: The thief made off with the treaty, but was caught red-handed.
translation.de: Der Dieb wurde aber auf frischer Tat ertappt.

translation.en: Spent the rest of his years locked in a dungeon.
translation.de: Er verbrachte sein Leben im Verlies.

translation.en: Princess Emily, please don't fret, I have never heard of such a legend.
translation.de: Prinzessin Emily, keine Sorge. Diese Legende kenne ich nicht.

translation.en: And nor have I.
I have.
I started working for your grandparents when I was just a lad.
translation.de: Ich arbeitete für Eure Großeltern, als ich jung war.

translation.en: They told me that the ghost of that wretched thief
translation.de: Sie sagten mir, dass der Geist dieses Diebes

translation.en: still roamed the darkest depths of the dungeon,
translation.de: noch in den Tiefen des Verlieses irrt,

translation.en: searching for his coveted prize.
translation.de: auf der Suche nach seinem Schatz.

translation.en: -I've never heard such nonsense. -Neither have I, Your Majesty.
translation.de: -Diesen Nonsens habe ich noch nie gehört. -Ich auch nicht.

translation.en: -[Queen Helena laughs heartily] -I was of the same mind, Your Majesty.
translation.de: -Diesen Nonsens habe ich noch nie gehört. -Ich auch nicht. Ich war derselben Meinung, Eure Majestät.

translation.en: Then, one Christmas Eve,
despite all the warnings, I snuck into the dungeon.
translation.de: entgegen allen Warnungen, schlich ich mich ins Verlies.

translation.en: And?
I heard a tortured moaning.
Then I felt a chilling breeze...
translation.de: Dann spürte ich einen eisigen Windzug...

translation.en: and then...
I ran.
Okay, so this is my favorite.
-Aw! [chuckles] He's so cute! -I know.
Queen Helena said that it was Richard's favorite childhood toy.
translation.de: Königin Helena sagte, er war Richards Lieblingsspielzeug.

translation.en: Mr. Paddy Claw Paws.
Oh... I hope you have veto rights on your baby's name.
translation.de: Ihr habt hoffentlich Vetorecht bei der Namensgebung.

translation.en: -[Amber] Oh, okay, very good. -[curious instrumentals]
I can't believe you made this for me.
-I hope you like it. -I love it.
It's a special Penglian pattern my grandmother taught me.
translation.de: Das penglische Muster lehrte mich meine Großmutter.

translation.en: [Amber] She must've been very talented. -[Queen Ming] She was. -[Amber] Thank you. I appreciate it.
translation.de: -Sie war offenbar talentiert. -Ja, das war sie.

translation.en: They're such fun.
I think we're almost done here.
Looks like it.
I'm sorry for all the strife the treaty has caused.
translation.de: Tut mir leid, dass der Vertrag Ärger machte.

translation.en: Well it's not your doing the treaty disappeared, right?
translation.de: Der Vertrag verschwand ja nicht Euretwegen? Oder?

translation.en: Well, it's not that.
I know that Ming was uneasy about the idea of her and Amber signing it.
translation.de: Ming fühlte sich unwohl, wenn sie und Amber unterschreiben.

translation.en: I'm happy for Ming to sign,
but she's worried what our people will think if she seeks credit,
translation.de: Sie fürchtet, das Volk halte sie für geltungssüchtig.

translation.en: despite all she does for Penglia.
translation.de: Obwohl sie viel für Penglien tut.

translation.en: Aldovia has embraced Queen Amber. Penglia adores Ming.
She deserves her due.
Not bad for a couple of kings on their own.
translation.de: Nicht schlecht für ein paar Könige, ganz auf sich gestellt.

translation.en: -Look at that. -Huh.
-Uh-oh... -What?
Pretty sure this is meant to be on the outside.
translation.de: Ziemlich sicher, dass außen sein soll.

translation.en: -Is it? -[exhales]
-Do you think it matters? -[bed creaks, crashes]
-[sighs deeply] -I think it might.
You really haven't missed a beat.
[Lynn] You...
are not so bad yourself.
I think we deserve everything that's coming to us.
translation.de: Wir verdienen alles, was auf uns zukommt.

translation.en: There's something I want to show you. Come with me.
translation.de: Ich will dir etwas zeigen. Komm mit.

translation.en: -Simon! -Melissa, I--
I was... [stammers]
How about some tea?
What's that you're hiding?
Nothing.
What's really going on with you and Lynn?
translation.de: Was läuft zwischen dir und Lynn?

translation.en: What's going on? I told you, she's just an old friend.
translation.de: Was da läuft? Wie gesagt, sie ist eine alte Freundin.

translation.en: Okay.
We dated, briefly, at school.
translation.de: Wir waren kurz zusammen in der Uni.

translation.en: Two dates, three at the most.
We quickly realized we're better suited as friends.
translation.de: Wir merkten bald, dass wir besser nur Freunde sind.

translation.en: Now, about that tea.
Amber was right about you.
An early Christmas gift.
You two can match.
It's Simon and Lynn together.
translation.de: Simon und Lynn waren es gemeinsam.

translation.en: What's going on? What's wrong?
You were right about Simon's intentions. He's hiding things.
translation.de: Du hattest recht mit Simon. Er verschweigt was.

translation.en: Look at this.
This is private financial information about the trade agreement.
Is this an assessment of Aldovia's debt to Penglia, a billion euros?
translation.de: Steht da, dass Aldovien Penglien eine Mrd. Euro schuldet?

translation.en: That sounds correct.
But a year ago it was five billion, and with our economy, it should be gone by spring.
translation.de: Vor einem Jahr waren es fünf. Bis Frühling sind sie getilgt.

translation.en: -[mellow instrumentals] -Unless the treaty is broken.
In which case it's due immediately.
Simon's helping Lynn for a piece of the action.
translation.de: Simon hilft Lynn für eine Gegenleistung.

translation.en: Selling out his own kingdom.
I say we make a formal accusation. I'll help you make it.
I'm so sorry, Melissa. I never wanted to be right about him.
translation.de: Es tut mir leid, Melissa. Ich wollte nie recht haben.

translation.en: I didn't want you to be, either.
We have a Malinois, a police dog arriving first thing. Once it sniffs out the treaty, we'll make a move.
translation.de: Morgen früh kommt ein Polizeihund. Sobald er den Vertrag hat, handeln wir.

translation.en: -Why wait? -We have to have proof. Can't offend the Penglians.
translation.de: -Warum warten? -Ohne Beweise kränken wir die Penglianer.

translation.en: As long as this treaty is signed by midnight tomorrow.
Meanwhile, I want you to keep an eye on Simon.
translation.de: Behalte bis dahin Simon im Auge.

translation.en: -I'd rather not look at him right now. -Please.
It's important he doesn't suspect a thing.
Our baby's future depends on it.
On the treaty? How?
Sit down.
You of all people know me better than that.
translation.de: Gerade du müsstest mich besser kennen.

translation.en: No, it's too pathetic.
you just don't understand how things work in a palace.
translation.de: du verstehst nicht, wie es in einem Palast läuft.

translation.en: No, too arrogant.
if you could only trust--
You came back?
-[dog pants] -I grew up with this breed, Your Majesties.
translation.de: Ich wuchs mit dieser Rasse auf.

translation.en: Their sense of smell is unsurpassed.
The treaty will be sniffed out imminently.
Can you please tell me the status on Aldovia's roadways?
translation.de: Können Sie mir den Zustand auf Aldoviens Straßen mitteilen?

translation.en: Fully plowed by the end of day.
translation.de: Bis zum Tagesende sind sie geräumt.

translation.en: And the airport? Rescheduled to open this evening.
translation.de: -Und der Flughafen? -Soll heute Abend wieder öffnen.

translation.en: I've already spoken to our pilot. We depart at first clearing.
translation.de: Ich sprach mit dem Piloten. Wir fliegen schnellstmöglich.

translation.en: Have faith. The dog will find it.
translation.de: Hab Vertrauen. Der Hund wird ihn finden.

translation.en: Mr. Little has advised that we remain outside the palace
translation.de: Mr. Little riet uns, außerhalb des Palastes zu bleiben.

translation.en: so the dog can work without distraction.
translation.de: So kann der Hund konzentriert arbeiten.

translation.en: Where are we to go?
Aldovia's Christmas market is just a short walk down the hill.
translation.de: Unser Weihnachtsmarkt ist nur einen Katzensprung entfernt.

translation.en: It's absolutely magical on Christmas Eve.
Perfect place to hope for a Christmas miracle.
translation.de: Perfekt, um auf ein Weihnachtswunder zu hoffen.

translation.en: A Christmas Eve miracle. -We only have till midnight. -♪ ...goodwill to men ♪
translation.de: Heiligabend-Wunder. Uns bleibt nur bis Mitternacht.

translation.en: -♪ The world in solemn stillness lay... ♪ -Oh! It's Queen Amber!
translation.de: Du bist so witzig. Tom lud sich selbst ein? Königin Amber!

translation.en: [gasps] It's Queen Amber!
-[gasps] Merry Christmas, Queen Amber! -Oh!
[man] So lovely to see you both.
[Richard] Thank you very much.
[Amber] Hi, Merry Christmas.
-Hello, merry Christmas. -You look amazing.
[Amber] Thank you so much.
-Hello. -[Richard] Hello.
Merry Christmas, Queen Amber. -Merry Christmas, Queen Amber. -[choir continues]
translation.de: -Frohes Fest, Königin Amber. -Frohes Fest, Königin Amber.

translation.en: Happy Christmas, King Richard.
-Thank you. -Are you enjoying the market?
[Amber] Loving the market. Thank you so much.
The people adore their Queen Amber.
translation.de: Das Volk liebt ihre Königin Amber.

translation.en: -[Richard and Amber chuckle] -I'd say they're both beloved.
translation.de: Beide sind beliebt. Ein schöner Markt.

translation.en: You deserve the same.
You should accept the credit for all you do for Penglia.
translation.de: Nimm das Lob an für alles, was du für Penglien tust.

translation.en: -[Amber] Hi, everyone. [laughs] -[Richard laughs]
Queen Ming, King Tai, do come and join us.
translation.de: Königin Ming, König Tai, kommt zu uns.

translation.en: -That looks fun. -♪ Making spirits bright ♪
-♪ A sleighing song tonight ♪ -Are you thinking what I'm thinking?
-I wish. - ♪ Jingle bells, jingle bells ♪
-♪ O' what fun it is to ride ♪ -Say no more.
I can't believe they let us do this.
Sometimes it's very useful to be king.
translation.de: Manchmal ist es nützlich, König zu sein.

translation.en: Or a princess.
Faster, faster!
[laughs] You asked for it!
We will turn you into an extreme winter sports athlete yet.
translation.de: Wir werden dich zu einer Extremwintersportlerin machen.

translation.en: -I'd like to try snow kiting. -Oh!
Perhaps next year.
You're my witness, Tom. You heard my brother.
translation.de: Du bist mein Zeuge. Du hast ihn gehört.

translation.en: [laughs] I did.
This looks so fun.
I'll see you on the ice, all right?
translation.de: Wir sehen uns auf dem Eis.

translation.en: Come on, keep up!
You're such a show-off.
-[Richard] Keep up. -And can't promise anything.
Don't fall behind. What?
Are you hurt?
-[ice whooshes] -He's a lot tougher than he looks.
translation.de: Er ist härter im Nehmen, als er aussieht.

translation.en: [sighs] I'm really not, actually.
I feel like a ballerina!
Look at them.
-That was amazing. -[man yells joyfully]
For a moment, I almost forgot about everything.
translation.de: Für einen Moment hatte ich fast alles vergessen.

translation.en: -It's going to be fine. -[Amber sighs deeply]
With us and the baby.
I hope so.
King Tai.
Come on, Ming.
It's been too long not skating.
Anything else?
[gasps] Archery!
That's something I can do.
-I challenge anyone to archery. -[Queen Helena] You may regret it.
translation.de: Ich fordere alle zum Bogenschießen heraus. Ihr werdet es bereuen. Wir haben einen Meisterschützen.

translation.en: We have a champion archer in the fold.
translation.de: Ihr werdet es bereuen. Wir haben einen Meisterschützen.

translation.en: Champion archer? Me?
According to Queen Helena.
I've seen her stop an embezzler with her bow.
translation.de: Sie hielt Kriminelle mit dem Bogen auf.

translation.en: Sounds like a bit of fun.
Visiting kingdom shoots first.
Nicely done, my dear.
Excellent shot, my Queen.
Clear your mind and focus on what's most important.
You got this.
Excuse me, Your Majesties, a message from the palace regarding the treaty.
translation.de: Verzeihung, eine Nachricht vom Palast. Der Vertrag.

translation.en: The dog failed, the treaty remains lost.
translation.de: Der Hund versagte, der Vertrag ist weg.

translation.en: -Whoa. Bullseye! -[Amber sighs]
She's fainted.
Let's just make it to the chaise.
Really, Richard, [stammers] I'm okay.
-I just want to make sure. -[Amber sighs]
Doctor Magoro. Sir, it's Dr. Magoro.
Thank you.
-I understand the Queen's fainted? -Yes.
Yes, she fainted, but she's awake now.
-She has been overdoing it. -[Richard] I thought so.
You've overdone it.
She needs rest. [Richard] Rest, yes. I'll tell her.
Why don't I drive to the palace?
We'd be very grateful.Thank you.
She's on her way.
I told you, I'm fine.
translation.de: Ich sagte, es geht mir gut.

translation.en: Still, you must rest until she gets here.
translation.de: Ruh dich aus, bis sie kommt.

translation.en: That's doctor's and king's orders.
Princess' orders as well.
Rest.
How can I when we only have until midnight?
translation.de: Wie? Wir haben nur bis Mitternacht Zeit.

translation.en: How long?
Great, thank you.
The airport is opening shortly.
Will you please arrange transport? I will see to it, Miss Lynn.
translation.de: -Arrangieren Sie bitte den Transport? -Sofort, Miss Lynn.

translation.en: There you are.
Sorry, I have some news.
The airport is open. The Penglians are leaving.
translation.de: Der Flughafen ist offen. Die Penglianer reisen ab.

translation.en: [Queen Helena] Oh my goodness.
Shall I speak to them?
-Please, Mother. -Mr. Zabala
Yes, of course, Your Majesty. Excuse me.
What do we do now?
We have to expose Simon and Lynn. It's our last hope to find the treaty.
translation.de: Wir müssen Simon und Lynn entlarven. Unsere letzte Hoffnung.

translation.en: Absolutely.
He and Lynn have been conspiring since she arrived.
translation.de: Er und Lynn konspirieren seit ihrer Ankunft.

translation.en: -That's disgraceful. -But not unexpected.
Listen, something is nagging at me.
Call it instinct.
If we are correct, and Simon and Lynn took the treaty and hid it,
translation.de: Wenn Simon und Lynn den Vertrag versteckt haben,

translation.en: why didn't the police dog find it?
-We'll have to ask Simon. -But there's more.
translation.de: -Wir müssen Simon fragen. -Es gibt noch was.

translation.en: The old scandal between Prince Claude and Prince Jun.
translation.de: Der Skandal zwischen Prinz Claude und Prinz Jun.

translation.en: The family swore they would get revenge.
Maybe that's why the treaty was nearly stolen 200 years ago.
translation.de: Vielleicht wollte man den Vertrag deshalb vor 200 Jahren stehlen.

translation.en: The treaty was stolen before?
What, what's wrong?
I don't know, cramping. [pants] Cramping bad.
translation.de: Ich weiß nicht. Krämpfe. Schlimme Krämpfe.

translation.en: Oh my gosh.
Does that mean...
-I think so. -What is it?
I'm going into labor.
Hello? King Richard?
Doctor, Amber's gone into labor.
Labor? Now?
No, no, no, she's not due until January, Your Majesty.
translation.de: Das Baby soll erst im Januar kommen.

translation.en: Her back hurts and she has cramping.
Could be forced labor due to over activity.
She has been very active.
Tell the Queen, deep breaths and remain calm.
translation.de: Die Königin soll tief atmen und entspannt bleiben.

translation.en: All right. Thank you, Doctor.
See you very soon. Bye.
-Is it true? Have you gone into labor? -It appears so.
translation.de: -Ist es wahr? Hast du Wehen? -Es scheint so.

translation.en: -How far apart are the contractions? -Close. Getting stronger.
translation.de: -Wie groß sind die Abstände? -Kurz. Sie werden stärker.

translation.en: We call them surges as per the doctor -who's on her way. -[phone ringing]
translation.de: Wir nennen sie Stoß, laut Ärztin, die gleich kommt.

translation.en: This is her.
[Dr. Magoro] King Richard...
I found myself in a bit of a situation.
[exhales] Where are you? North road. Stay in your car.
translation.de: Wo sind Sie? Nördliche Straße. Bleiben Sie im Auto.

translation.en: What is it?
She's stuck in a snow bank. But the baby's coming.
I used to volunteer at a maternity ward. I will help you through this.
translation.de: Ich hospitierte auf einer Entbindungsstation. Ich helfe.

translation.en: Tai, cancel our flight.
Of course. Lynn!
Thank you, Queen Ming.
-I'll get Dr. Magoro. -[exhales] Richard!
I'll be back with her as soon as I can. You can do this, birth plan or not.
translation.de: Wir sind bald zurück. Du schaffst das, mit und ohne Plan.

translation.en: I love you.
-I love you. -[kissing sound]
-[Amber inhales] -Take care of her, please.
Richard, we heard about Amber. Is there--
translation.de: Richard, wir hörten von Amber. Ist...

translation.en: -[gruff] I'll deal with you later. -[Simon] Wh--
-Good boy, let's go. -[thudding]
I too had the baby come early.
translation.de: Mein Baby war auch zu früh dran.

translation.en: -You did? -My son.
He's okay?
He's intelligent, capable
-and has the energy of three boys. -[Amber sighs]
translation.de: und hat die Energie von drei Jungen.

translation.en: Your baby will be perfectly fine.
translation.de: Eurem Baby wird es gut ergehen.

translation.en: Your child is strong, Amber. Like you and Richard.
translation.de: Dein Kind ist stark, Amber. Wie du und Richard.

translation.en: But I can't help but worry that it's going to be midnight soon.
translation.de: Ich bin besorgt, weil es bald Mitternacht ist.

translation.en: If that treaty isn't signed, my baby is cursed.
translation.de: Wird der Vertrag nicht unterzeichnet, ist mein Baby verflucht.

translation.en: I told you not to worry Amber with that nonsense.
translation.de: Du solltest Amber damit nicht behelligen.

translation.en: But what if it's true?
Sorcery was discredited a long time ago,
translation.de: Hexerei wurde vor langer Zeit abgeschafft,

translation.en: for good reason.
Many old treaties involved punitive superstitions.
translation.de: In vielen alten Verträgen stehen abergläubische Strafen.

translation.en: -It's not unusual. -[Amber sighs]
Tell me about this one.
Well, what I read was about a sorceress that cast a spell.
translation.de: Ich las von einer Zauberin, die einen Fluch aussprach.

translation.en: Not tonight.
-Come on! -[horse brays]
The curse affects the firstborn child of whichever kingdom causes the truce to break.
translation.de: Es betrifft das Erstgeborene jenen Reichs, das den Waffenstillstand bricht.

translation.en: Typical for its time, but that time is not our time.
translation.de: Typisch für damals, aber damals ist nicht heute.

translation.en: Still...
You don't want to risk it, I understand,
translation.de: Ihr wollt es nicht riskieren. Verstehe ich.

translation.en: as small a chance as it may be.
translation.de: Auch wenn die Chance gering ist,

translation.en: A mother's love for her child is greater than anything.
translation.de: Mutterliebe ist stärker als alles andere.

translation.en: Someone in this palace sabotaged the signing of the treaty. Why?
translation.de: Jemand im Palast hat die Unterzeichnung sabotiert. Warum?

translation.en: [exhales] Your Majesty! I've spoken to the doctor and she said it's acceptable to administer pain medication for your...
translation.de: Eure Majestät! Die Ärztin sagt, man könne Schmerzmedikamente gegen...

translation.en: surges.
Thank you, Mrs. Averill, but I need to keep my mind sharp.
translation.de: Danke, aber ich muss klar denken können.

translation.en: We all want what's best for your baby and for you.
translation.de: Wir alle wollen das Beste für dein Baby und dich.

translation.en: Please try not to worry needlessly.
translation.de: Bitte mach dir keine unnötigen Sorgen.

translation.en: Maybe it isn't needless.
It could be real. After all, our dungeon is haunted.
translation.de: Es könnte stimmen. Immerhin spukt's im Verlies.

translation.en: -Haunted? -Yes.
Mr. Little even encountered it,
the ghost of the thief who stole the treaty 200 years ago.
translation.de: den Geist des Diebes, der vor 200 Jahren den Vertrag stahl.

translation.en: [breathless] Emily, listen to me.
I need you to do something for me right now. [sharp exhale]
translation.de: Du musst mir einen Gefallen tun.

translation.en: Why on earth did Amber want us to come down here?
translation.de: Warum in aller Welt wollte Amber, dass wir herkommen?

translation.en: She insists we search the furthest corner.
[Emily] Pray we avoid the ghost that haunts this dungeon.
translation.de: Hoffentlich treffen wir nicht auf den Geist im Verlies.

translation.en: You're not scared of the made-up ghost, are you?
translation.de: Dir macht doch der erfundene Geist keine Angst?

translation.en: What was that?
Just-- Just our imaginations.
translation.de: Das ist nur in unseren Köpfen.

translation.en: Working in unison.
Come along.
[Emily] Leopold was here.
Now we are.
-[keys jingling] -[Emily] Oh, no!
[yelling] Help!
Oh, dear.
[Emily, yelling] Help! Help us!
Help!
Please help!
-Are you all right? -I am now, thank you.
I trust you know how to ride. [exhales]
-I do, indeed. -[door clicks open]
-Poor thing. -[continued groaning]
This is not the time, Simon.
Amber. You look like you could use these.
translation.de: Amber. Scheint, als könntest du die gebrauchen.

translation.en: Squeeze these when you're feeling overwhelmed.
Works for me.
Thank you, Simon.
The hot water you requested, Your Majesty.
I need a heating pad and a paint roller with a good handle.
translation.de: Ich brauche ein Heizkissen und eine Farbrolle mit gutem Griff.

translation.en: Of course, straight away.
I have a heating pad and good luck with the roller.
translation.de: Ich hab ein Heizkissen. Viel Glück mit der Rolle.

translation.en: Is there anything we can do to help?
I am charged with finding a paint roller in a palace.
translation.de: Ich soll einen Farbroller in einem Palast finden.

translation.en: -I possess such an item. -[playful instrumentals]
-Really? -You do?
With a good handle?
A very excellent handle, yes.
And may I ask why?
No, you may not, Andrew.
Come, Mr. Z.
-We will get it. -Thank you.
[Emily, yelling] Help! Please help us!
Help!
It's no use, darling, no one can hear us.
translation.de: Es bringt nichts, niemand hört uns.

translation.en: Look, a key!
-[sighs] It's too far. -[strained exhale]
[breathless] That's really helping. How long did you volunteer at the hospital?
translation.de: Das hilft. Wie lang habt Ihr im Krankenhaus gearbeitet?

translation.en: -Many years. -You certainly learned a lot.
I learned no job is more demanding or rewarding than motherhood.
translation.de: Ich lernte, nichts ist anstrengender und lohnender als Muttersein.

translation.en: Penglia now has services in place
to assist and support all of our mothers in any way they might need.
translation.de: um all unseren Müttern zu helfen und sie zu unterstützen.

translation.en: [exhales] I heard about that program, it's fantastic.
I'm trying to implement something similar here, with a few updates.
translation.de: Ich will hier auch so etwas aufbauen, etwas moderner.

translation.en: -You're so close. -[grunts]
That's it, almost. You have it, you've got it.
-You got it! -[strains]
There you are. Good girl.
Almost there.
Lift it up.
-Emily! -[thud]
Emily, are you all right?
-Yes, I'm fine. -The stone didn't hurt you?
translation.de: -Mir geht's gut. -Der Stein tat dir nicht weh?

translation.en: Look, in there.
-I can't believe it. -The missing treaty.
What was that?
The ghost, coming to get the treaty.
