translation.de: Der Geist will den Vertrag holen.

translation.en: -[pants] -No, listen.
It's the wind blowing through the stones.
translation.de: Der Wind weht durch die Steine.

translation.en: -[stammers] So, no ghost? -[exhales]
No.
But we have the treaty.
But we're still locked in.
-[Richard] Amber. -[Amber] Richard.
-[Richard pants] How are you? -No baby yet.
Everything's going to be fine, Your Majesty.
How far apart are the surges?
Five minutes, progressing steadily.
Ah. Thank you for being so attentive.
It's useless.
It's nearly midnight.
It's over.
We mustn't give up. But what can we do?
translation.de: -Wir dürfen nicht aufgeben. -Aber was können wir tun?

translation.en: This.
[chuckles] Brilliant, Mother.
The linens, doctor.
[Amber] What time is it?
Ten minutes to midnight.
[breathless] Where are they?
The treaty, we found the treaty.
What? Where?
In the dungeon.
How did you know?
Amber solved the mystery.
I did.
Come in, everyone. You all need to hear this.
translation.de: Tretet ein. Hört euch das an.

translation.en: Someone right here, in this very room, stole the treaty.
translation.de: Jemand hier in diesem Raum stahl den Vertrag.

translation.en: [Richard] Tell us everything you know.
The scandal that followed the signing of the treaty
resulted in the alleged poisoning of Prince Claude.
translation.de: führte zur angeblichen Vergiftung von Prinz Claude.

translation.en: His family swore vengeance
and a member of that family is in this room.
translation.de: Ein Mitglied dieser Familie ist unter uns.

translation.en: [Richard] Go on.
Prince Claude's family name, Devon, was familiar to me
translation.de: Prinz Claudes Familienname, Devon, kam mir bekannt vor.

translation.en: and tonight I remembered why.
I read it in this book.
translation.de: Ich las ihn in diesem Buch.

translation.en: Your mother's maiden name was Devin.
translation.de: Der Mädchenname Ihrer Mutter war Devon.

translation.en: Wasn't it, Mr. Little?
I know it was you, Mr. Little.
translation.de: Ich weiß, dass Sie es waren, Mr. Little.

translation.en: You were the last one to lock up the treaty,
translation.de: Sie waren es, der den Vertrag wegschloss.

translation.en: you kept the dog out of the dungeon and you tried to keep Emily out of the dungeon
translation.de: Sie hielten den Hund aus dem Verlies fern und versuchten es auch bei Emily,

translation.en: with some made-up ghost story.
-[continued sighing] -If you're guilty, Mr. Little, confess here and now.
translation.de: Wenn Sie schuldig sind, Mr. Little, gestehen Sie hier und jetzt.

translation.en: I did do it.
To break the truce and sever our ties with Penglia.
translation.de: Um den Waffenstillstand zu beenden und die Verbindung zu Penglien zu kappen.

translation.en: But why?
I was bound by a solemn blood oath,
a sworn duty to avenge the crime against my family by the Penglian Prince Jun.
translation.de: das Verbrechen an meiner Familie durch Prinz Jun von Penglien zu rächen.

translation.en: Mr. Little, Prince Jun's guilt was never proven.
translation.de: Mr. Little, Prinz Juns Schuld wurde nie bewiesen.

translation.en: Our historians believe that the real culprit was a covetous feudal lord.
translation.de: Unsere Historiker glauben, der wahre Täter war ein habgieriger Feudalherr.

translation.en: I had a duty. I fulfilled it.
You nearly started a war.
translation.de: Sie lösten fast einen Krieg aus.

translation.en: And could have cursed an innocent baby.
translation.de: Und verfluchten fast ein unschuldiges Baby.

translation.en: I didn't know about the curse until tonight.
translation.de: Ich wusste bis eben nichts vom Fluch.

translation.en: And I would never bring harm to your baby.
translation.de: Ich würde Eurem Baby nie etwas antun.

translation.en: -[Queen Helena] Mr. Zabala. -Ma'am?
Take Mr. Little to the Leopold Suite.
translation.de: Bringen Sie Mr. Little in die Leopold-Suite.

translation.en: Simon, I apologize for my behavior earlier.
translation.de: Simon... Ich entschuldige mich für mein Verhalten.

translation.en: Did you think...
We had our suspicions.
Not you, too!
Lynn and I have been working diligently
on economic amendments to the treaty which should benefit both kingdoms.
translation.de: an wirtschaftlichen Änderungen im Vertrag, für beide Seiten.

translation.en: And we've found a very promising solution.
That's all it was, I promise.
What is it?
When I came to your room last night after Lynn left, you hid something.
translation.de: Du hast gestern Abend nach Lynns Besuch was versteckt.

translation.en: [stammers] How can that relate to the treaty?
translation.de: Was hat das mit dem Vertrag zu tun?

translation.en: It didn't.
Lynn was helping to make sure I chose well
translation.de: Lynn sollte bestätigen, dass ich eine gute Wahl traf,

translation.en: when picking out the most important gift I'll offer you.
translation.de: bei meinem größten Geschenk an dich.

translation.en: I wanted to wait until tomorrow, but...
translation.de: Ich wollte bis morgen warten, aber...

translation.en: Melissa, my love...
Although I'm undeserving of such an honor,
translation.de: Obwohl ich es nicht verdient habe...

translation.en: will you marry me?
-[whimsical instrumentals] -Yes! Yes. -Yes! -[laughter]
[Richard] Congratulations.
Congratulations, Simon.
[Emily] Congratulations, Melissa.
You could have done worse. Oh, that's a ringing endorsement. [chuckles]
Don't let it get to your head.
I see a royal title in your future, Simon.
translation.de: Ich sehe einen königlichen Titel in deiner Zukunft.

translation.en: Perhaps Duke?
I accept.
This is such wonderful news. I'm so happy for you.
translation.de: Wunderbare Neuigkeiten. Ich freue mich so für euch.

translation.en: But we're running out of time. It's nearly midnight
translation.de: Aber die Zeit drängt. Es ist fast Mitternacht.

translation.en: and there's a treaty to sign.
-Quickly. -[Queen Ming] Yes.
We must allow the time for the Queens to sign as well.
translation.de: Wir müssen den Königinnen auch Zeit geben zu unterschreiben.

translation.en: There's always time to make history.
translation.de: Es ist immer Zeit, um Geschichte zu schreiben.

translation.en: [sharp exhale] But not too much time.
Your Majesty, King Tai.
The visiting monarch signs first.
After you, my Queen.
You have made me and all of Penglia very proud.
translation.de: Du hast mich und ganz Penglien stolz gemacht.

translation.en: At the hour of 11:59, on December the 24th in the year 2019,
I declare the truce and treaty
between the kingdoms of Aldovia and Penglia
translation.de: zwischen den Königreichen Aldovien und Penglien

translation.en: executed,
ratified and renewed for the next 100 years.
translation.de: ratifiziert und erneuert für die nächsten 100 Jahre.

translation.en: We made it.
-[exhales] -Merry Christmas.
-Happy anniversary. -[cheery instrumentals]
Merry Christmas, everyone.
-Merry Christmas! -[excited chatter]
-Merry Christmas, Mrs. Averill. -[laughs]
I think it's time.
-[Amber exhales] -Everyone except the father, out.
The royal baby is ready to make its entrance.
translation.de: Das königliche Baby ist bereit für den Einzug.

translation.en: Okay.
-Yes. -[Dr. Magoro] Thank you.
Okay.
[clicks tongue] Congratulations.
A healthy, beautiful baby.
[exhales] Thank goodness.
Well done, Amber.
Queen Amber, King Richard,
may I present to you the future monarch of Aldovia,
translation.de: darf ich Euch die Thronerbin Aldoviens vorstellen?

translation.en: your daughter.
[chuckles] Hi.
She's beautiful.
She's incredible.
Just like her mother.
Thank you.
Amber and I are the proud parents...
translation.de: Amber und ich sind stolze Eltern...

translation.en: of a new...
baby girl.
I knew it was a girl.
translation.de: Ich wusste, es wird ein Mädchen.

translation.en: -Congratulations. -Thank you.
Your father would be overjoyed if he were here.
translation.de: Mutter. Dein Vater wäre überglücklich, wenn er hier wäre.

translation.en: Mr. Zabala, champagne for the baby girl!
translation.de: Mr. Zabala, Champagner für die Kleine!

translation.en: Girl? Did I just hear I have a granddaughter?
translation.de: Mädchen? Habe ich gerade gehört, dass ich eine Enkelin habe?

translation.en: Merry Christmas, everyone.
I fought my way onto the first flight.
translation.de: Ich kämpfte mich zum ersten Flug durch.

translation.en: You're just in time to meet her. Mother, Rudy.
translation.de: Du kommst gerade rechtzeitig. Mutter, Rudy.

translation.en: Pop, you made it.
How's my little peanut?
Never better.
Meet your granddaughter, Elleri.
You named her after mom.
translation.de: Du hast sie nach Mom benannt.

translation.en: -You're perfect. -[laughs]
-Here. -Ooh!
Come to grandpa.
-[Amber] She likes you. -[Rudy laughs]
[Rudy] Yeah.
translation.de: Entschuldigung, wir müssen das Baby wiegen. Danke.

translation.en: Such a beautiful name.
Beautiful baby. Congratulations.
The plane is standing by.
We can be back in Penglia by sunrise to enjoy Christmas with your children.
translation.de: Wir sind morgens in Penglien, um Weihnachten mit den Kindern zu feiern.

translation.en: Go home, be with your family.
And Ming...
thank you for everything.
Thank you.
Call me anytime.
Even better, bring your little one for a visit.
translation.de: Noch besser, komm mit der Kleinen zu Besuch.

translation.en: We can discuss our programs for mothers in person.
translation.de: Wir können über die Mütter-Programme reden.

translation.en: I'd love to.
[King Tai] King Richard, it's been an adventure.
translation.de: König Richard, es war ein Abenteuer.

translation.en: [Queen Ming] A Penglian symbol of mother's nurturing strength.
translation.de: Ein penglisches Symbol für die Stärke der Mutter.

translation.en: It's yours now.
Are you sure?
Queen Amber of Aldovia,
you are going to be a wonderful mother.
translation.de: du wirst eine wunderbare Mutter sein.

translation.en: Thank you.
Today, her Royal Highness, Queen Amber of Aldovia,
translation.de: Heute hat Ihre Königliche Hoheit, Königin Amber von Aldovien,

translation.en: safely delivered a daughter, Princess Elleri Claire Charlton.
translation.de: eine Tochter geboren, Prinzessin Elleri Claire Charlton.

translation.en: [woman 3] Come on, Princess!
[man 2] Congratulations.
I love our princess. So do I.
I love you.
[Amber] I want to thank you all, my loyal readers,
translation.de: Ich möchte euch allen danken, meine treuen Leser,

translation.en: for sharing this amazing journey with me.
translation.de: dass ihr diese tolle Reise mit mir teilt.

translation.en: I couldn't be more grateful.
On behalf of Richard, myself, Elleri and the Royal family of Aldovia,
translation.de: Im Namen von Richard, mir, Elleri und der königlichen Familie Aldoviens

translation.en: we wish you all a very Merry Christmas
and a Happy New Year.
